title: tAmasamElanamma
sahitya:
tAmasamElanamma dayajUDaninta tAmasamElanamma


anupallavi

  shrImadAdi purini velayu shrI tripura sundari brOva


caraNam 1    kanna talli nApAla karuNajUDumani entO vinnapamulu jEsi ninnu vEDukO lEdA
A pannaga rakSaki nE I bAdha paTuDa jUci nIvu binnagAnu brOcEnani pilaci diTavu balkanikanu
    caraNam 2    ninu mincina daivamu lEdani nigamAdulu moraliDavini nI sannidhi goliciti vEDuka mIraganu
dhanapati sakhuDaina shrI tyAgEshu rANi nannu kanula calla gAnu jUci kAcedanani diTavu balka
    caraNam 3    mApAla velasina shrI marakatAngi vAlAyamu gOpAla dAsuDu ninnu koniyADaga lEdA 
nI prApu kOrina nanu nenaru mIragAnu pilaci kApATedanani ika kanikaramutO mATalATanika
